item.title: By: Jack Steeve
item.dc:creator: Jack Steeve
item.description: I have tried many crypto wallets for about 2 years, and I believe Atomic Wallet is the best one (not one of the best!). Thanks for the regular and excellent updates, and definitely for the professional and fast support!
item.content:encoded: I have tried many crypto wallets for about 2 years, and I believe Atomic Wallet is the best one (not one of the best!). Thanks for the regular and excellent updates, and definitely for the professional and fast support!

item.title: By: Michael Michael
item.dc:creator: Michael Michael
item.description: Atomic wallet will always be my go-to wallet to manage my crypto assets. The wallet offers security and convenience I haven't seen elsewhere.
item.content:encoded: Atomic wallet will always be my go-to wallet to manage my crypto assets. The wallet offers security and convenience I haven’t seen elsewhere.

item.title: By: Steven
item.dc:creator: Steven
item.description: I've chosen this wallet because I value security and atomic has never failed
item.content:encoded: I’ve chosen this wallet because I value security and atomic has never failed

item.title: By: Abdul
item.dc:creator: Abdul
item.description: Control over private keys is control over your funds, thanks to atomicwallet for that privilege ????????
